UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Discovery of synthetic penaeidin activity against antibiotic-resistant fungi.
Literature.Author: Cuthbertson BJ, Büllesbach EE, Gross PS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus(MIC=6.25-12.5µM),Bacillus cereus(MIC=>50µM),Bacillus subtilis(no activity data),Bacillus megaterium(MIC=>50µM),Bacillus sp.
